frontmatter.title: Service Mesh Offers Promising Solution for Cloud Native Networking
frontmatter.subtitle: Service Mesh can be thought of as a next generation of Software Defined Networking (SDN) for the cloud. Here are the main approaches.
frontmatter.author: Enterprise Networking Planet
frontmatter.description: Discover the future of cloud-native networking with service mesh, a next-gen SDN for the cloud. Explore benefits like team decoupling and learn about key projects such as Linkerd, Istio, and NSM. Dive into service mesh abstraction with SMI and SMP for simplified interoperability and performance insights.
